resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106198</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106198</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770210260</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Triads</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dreier</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Triades</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tríades</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Triadi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τριάδες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tríadas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Triads are basic three-note chords built of thirds. They can be in root position, first inversion, or second inversion.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dreier sind die grundlegenden Dreianmerkung 
Akkorde, die von den an dritter Stelle aufgebaut werden. Sie 
können in der Wurzelposition, in der ersten Umstellung oder in der 
zweiten Umstellung sein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les triades sont les cordes de base de trois-note 
construites des troisièmement. Elles peuvent être en position 
de racine, première inversion, ou deuxième inversion.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As tríades são cordas básicas da três-nota 
construídas dos em terceiro lugar. Podem estar na posição da 
raiz, no primeiro inversion, ou no segundo inversion.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le triadi sono corde di base della tre-nota 
costruite dei terzo. Possono essere nella posizione della 
radice, nella prima inversione, o nella seconda inversione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι τριάδες είναι βασικές χορδές τρεις-σημειώσεων που 
χτίζονται των τρίτων. Μπορούν να είναι στη θέση ρίζας, την
πρώτη αντιστροφή, ή τη δεύτερη αντιστροφή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las tríadas son acordes básicos de la tres-nota 
construidos de tercero. Pueden estar en la posición de la 
raíz, la primera inversión, o la segunda inversión.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:CATHERINE SCHMIDT-JONES
FN:CATHERINE SCHMIDT-JONES
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770210260</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution 1.0</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106198</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/triads</uri>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
